Name: securityMember
Description: Security member in the ivy security system.

Name: isShowAvatar
Description:
| Boolean value to specify avatar showing. Set to true to show avatar.
| The setting will detect Portal setting Portal.ShowAvatar as its default value, refer to HowTo: Update :ref:`update-portal-settings` for more details.
| If the Portal setting is not available, defaults to true.

Name: displayName
Description: The security member name is displayed.

Name: displayNameRendered
Description: If false, the security member name is hidden.

Name: displayNameStyleClass
Description: The style class is applied for display name element.

Name: containerStyleClass
Description: The style class is applied for container element.

Name: isStandAlone
Description: Set to false when you use this component in :ref:`components-portal-components-user-selection` and :ref:`components-portal-components-role-selection`.
